text:
I highly recommend Dr. Kausar based on my positive experience. I had never had a root canal treatment before, and I wasn‚Äôt sure where the pain was coming from, as I had no visible decay. However, Dr. Kausar quickly identified the issue with her expertise.

I underwent the root canal procedure on October 29th, and I was quite nervous beforehand. To my surprise, the entire process was painless until the very end. I returned for a follow-up today, and everything is healing perfectly.

The team of staff are also incredibly friendly and provide excellent service, which made the entire experience even better. If you're considering a root canal, Dr. Kausar is the one to go to. She is professional, skilled, and truly makes you feel at ease. You‚Äôll be in great hands!
Dr Kausar was very nice and help me with my teeth

The doctors and staff at the ODS Katong branch were very helpful -- and most importantly, compassionate -- to my helper who needed dentures for her lower teeth. Fast response, professionally handled (same day!), and I stress, compassionate. Would recommend!
Sara and Rai are  truly awesome. Such efficient people. There was hardly  any waiting time. Very helpful staff and amazing doctors. Dr. Tini is super capable and too good.

Had my ortho adjustment done (Tanjong Katong )
Hanna helped me out and explained the the charges clearly. She also sound sweet and kind over the phone. Thanks to Dr Kausar too for seeing me and explaining my treatment plan. Happy with my experience. Will definitely come back. I love the place where it is located too. You'll see a lot of cafes nearby. üòòüòçüëå
